name: Eugenia's Pursuit: The Hidden Legacy
description:
This game is a suspense-filled first-person survival horror game.

As a player, you will assume the role of Eugenia, a 27-year-old woman who is an intern reporter, infiltrating an abandoned building of the OHJIN Group.
You will explore the building interior, solve a variety of puzzles, and uncover hidden truths.
You will need to navigate all accessible floors of the building, surviving potential dangers through intelligent decision-making.

This game delivers a vibrant and tense experience with high-quality graphics and sound, testing your strategic thinking and decision-making skills.
